ARABIC: وَلَيَعْلَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَلَيَعْلَمَنَّ ٱلْمُنَٰفِقِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Allah knows those who have iman and He knows the hypocrites.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: God will surely know the believers and know the hypocrites.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Allah will surely ascertain who are the believers and who are the hypocrites.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God certainly knows all about the believers and the hypocrites.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed Allah will make known the believers, and indeed He will expose the hypocrites.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed Allah knows those who believe, and verily, He knows the hypocrites.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most certainly Allah will know those who believe and most certainly He will know the hypocrites.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: God surely knows the believers, and He knows the hypocrites.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Verily Allah knoweth those who believe, and verily He knoweth the hypocrites.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Most certainly God will mark out those who believe and mark out those who are hypocrites.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And surely Allah shall come to know those who believe, and surely He shall come to know the hypocrites.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Allah shall surely ascertain those who have faith, and He shall surely ascertain the hypocrites.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And Allah most certainly knows those who believe, and as certainly those who are Hypocrites.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, Allah knows those who believe, and verily, He knows the hypocrites [i.e. Allah will test the people with good and hard days to discriminate the good from the wicked (although Allah knows all that before putting them to test)].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Most certainly Allah knows the believers and the hypocrites.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: God certainly knows those who believe, and He certainly knows the hypocrites.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And Allah will surely make evident those who believe, and He will surely make evident the hypocrites.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [29:11] And God shall surely ascertain those who believe, in their hearts, and He shall surely ascertain the hypocrites, and He will requite each group accordingly (the lām in both verbs [la-ya‘lamanna, ‘He shall ascertain’] is for oaths).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Verily Allah knoweth) He sees and distinguishes (those who believe) in private and openly, (and verily He knoweth) He sees and distinguishes (the hypocrites) on the Day of Badr.
